Package wblut.hemesh.geom

Class Summary
WB WB contains constants and static methods for various purposes.
WB_AABB Axis-aligned bounding box.
WB_Circle 2D circle.
WB_IndexedSegment A subclass of WB_Segment referencing points as array indices.
WB_IndexedTriangle A subclass of WB_Triangle referencing points as array indices.
WB_Intersection WB_Intersection is a placeholder for intersection test results.
WB_Line 3D line.
WB_M33 3x3 Matrix.
WB_M44 4x4 matrix.
WB_Normal Normal.
WB_OBB Placeholder class for oriented bounding box.
WB_Plane 3D plane.
WB_Point Geometric point.
WB_Polygon Planar polygon class.
WB_Polygon.Ear Subclass Ear for ear-clipping purposes.
WB_Quad Placeholder for quad..
WB_Ray 3D Ray.
WB_Rect Placeholder for flat 3D rectangle.
WB_Segment 3D line segment.
WB_SimpleMesh Placeholder for simple mesh class.
WB_Sphere 3D Sphere.
WB_Tetrahedron Placeholder class for a 3D tetrahedron.
WB_Transform Generic transform class in homgeneous coordinates.
WB_Triangle 3D Triangle.
WB_Vector 3D Vector.
WB_XYZ Abstract class.
 

Enum Summary
WB.ClassifyPointToPlane Classification of point to plane.
WB.VertexType 2D convexity classification.
